attributes.action: Make banks and mortgage lenders accept 5% deposits
attributes.additional_details: Been trying to get onto the property ladder for couple months but banks and mortgage lenders are only accepting no less than 15%. Recently I’ve had my first baby and want to move out my parents house with my family but can’t due to banks not accepting 5%. Banks were accepting 5% at the beginning of the year so why not now? The country needs money into the system and this would be an ideal way.
attributes.background: Make banks and mortgage lenders accept 5% deposits To allow first time buyers and younger buyers the chance to purchase the first house to get onto the property ladder/ move out of their parents house or start their family’s.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Mortgage rates and deposits are a matter for individual lenders.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to fund or match deposits for first time buyers, to make it easier for them to get a mortgage, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
